publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6862 James Kelly: Jobs Boost at Vion (Cambuslang)—That the Parliament welcomes the announcement by the Vion Food Group of 100 new jobs at the company’s food processing plant in Cambuslang; believes that this investment will benefit not only Cambuslang but the Scottish economy as a whole, and congratulates the efforts of management, trade unions and Scottish Enterprise in securing this job creation. Supported by: Bill Kidd*, Andy Kerr*, Sarah Boyack*, Bob Doris*, Robert Brown*, Charlie Gordon*, Kenneth Gibson*, John Park*, Margaret Curran*, Jackie Baillie*, George Foulkes*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Dr Richard Simpson*, Ken Macintosh*, David Whitton*, Mary Mulligan*
S3M-6862 Jobs Boost at Vion (Cambuslang) (lodged on 24 August 2010) Gil Paterson*, Maureen Watt*, Bill Butler*, Jamie Hepburn*, Pauline McNeill*
S3M-6862 Jobs Boost at Vion (Cambuslang) (lodged on 24 August 2010) Marilyn Livingstone*
S3M-6862 Jobs Boost at Vion (Cambuslang) (lodged on 24 August 2010) Helen Eadie*
